guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Support Therapeutic Management Recommendations]: Carbamazepine - HLA-B

relatedGenes.name: major histocompatibility complex, class I, B

text.html: "Results in higher adverse reaction risk (severe skin reactions). Avoid use unless potential benefits outweigh risks and consider risks of alternative therapies. Patients positive for HLA-B*15:02 may be at increased risk of severe skin reactions with other drugs that are associated with a risk of Stevens Johnson Syndrome/Toxic Epidermal necrolysis (SJS/TEN). Genotyping is not a substitute for clinical vigilance."
